##++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
#flattenCorrMatrix
#++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
#cormat : matrix of the correlation coefficients
#pmat : matrix of the correlation p-values

```{r}
flattenCorrMatrix <- function(cormat, pmat) {
  ut <- upper.tri(cormat)
  data.frame(
    row = rownames(cormat)[row(cormat)[ut]],
    column = rownames(cormat)[col(cormat)[ut]],
    cor  =(cormat)[ut],
    p = pmat[ut]
    )
}
```
